meanings.definition: A person or organization that certifies something.
meanings.sent1: The certifier at the school verified that the students completed their training.
meanings.sent2: The certifier stamped the document to show it was official.
meanings.sent3: The certifier at the bakery confirmed that the cakes were delicious.
meanings.sent4: The certifier of quality ensured that the products met the highest standards.
meanings.sent5: The certifier's signature on the contract made it legally binding.

meanings.definition: To confirm or attest to the accuracy or truth of something.
meanings.sent1: She will certifier the results of the experiment before publishing them.
meanings.sent2: The expert will certifier the authenticity of the painting.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he would certifier that the cat was the best dancer.
meanings.sent4: The applause from the audience certifiered the success of the performance.
meanings.sent5: The bright smile on her face certifiered her happiness.
